bibl.title: Theudotus of Lipara (Callimachus, fr. 93 Pf.).
bibl.note: Deals with the textual constitution and the interpretation of a fragment from the fourth book of Callimachus' Aetia, entitled Theudotus Liparensis in Pfeiffer's edition (fr. 93).

bibl.title: Culture in Pieces. Essays on Ancient Texts in Honour of Peter Parsons.

bibl.seg: Massimilla Giulio, Theudotus of Lipara (Callimachus, fr. 93 Pf.).
Dirk Obbink and Richard Rutherford (Edd.), Culture in Pieces. Essays on Ancient Texts in Honour of Peter Parsons (Oxford, 2011) pp. 208-219.
Deals with the textual constitution and the interpretation of a fragment from the fourth book of Callimachus' Aetia, entitled Theudotus Liparensis in Pfeiffer's edition (fr. 93).
